response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which holds immense value and can significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its worth of $10,000 to you, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This exclusive opportunity allows you to secure this valuable asset at a significant discount. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and beneficial. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of assisting you with this purchase.", "product_price": 9500}
